     </a>
    </h2>
    <a class="btn-donate md:hidden" href="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=header">
     <span class="inline-block w-3 mr-1">
      <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
       <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
        <path d="M7.00000834,12.0000012 C6.8750082,12.0000012 6.75000805,11.9531261 6.65625793,11.859376 L1.78125212,7.15624542 C1.71875205,7.10155785 0,5.53124348 0,3.65624125 C0,1.36717602 1.39843917,-1.31130219e-05 3.73437945,-1.31130219e-05 C5.10156858,-1.31130219e-05 6.38282011,1.07811317 7.00000834,1.6874889 C7.61719658,1.07811317 8.89844811,-1.31130219e-05 10.2656372,-1.31130219e-05 C12.6015775,-1.31130219e-05 14.0000167,1.36717602 14.0000167,3.65624125 C14.0000167,5.53124348 12.2812646,7.10155785 12.2109521,7.17187044 L7.34375875,11.859376 C7.25000864,11.9531261 7.12500849,12.0000012 7.00000834,12.0000012 Z">
        </path>
       </g>
      </svg>
     </span>
     Donate
    </a>
    <nav class="flex-grow md:flex-grow-0" id="nav-main" role="navigation">
     <ul class="list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap items-center text-white font-md font-semibold justify-around" id="nav-main-menu">
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="/en-US/features">
        Features
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="https://addons.thunderbird.net">
        Add-ons
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="/en-US/get-involved">
        Get Involved
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="https://support.mozilla.org/products/thunderbird/">
        Get Help
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="/en-US/about">
        About Us
       </a>
      </li>
      <li>
       <a class="nav-link" href="https://blog.thunderbird.net/">
        Blog
       </a>
      </li>
      <li class="hidden md:inline">
       <a class="btn-donate" href="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=header">
        <span class="inline-block w-3 mr-1">
         <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
          <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
           <path d="M7.00000834,12.0000012 C6.8750082,12.0000012 6.75000805,11.9531261 6.65625793,11.859376 L1.78125212,7.15624542 C1.71875205,7.10155785 0,5.53124348 0,3.65624125 C0,1.36717602 1.39843917,-1.31130219e-05 3.73437945,-1.31130219e-05 C5.10156858,-1.31130219e-05 6.38282011,1.07811317 7.00000834,1.6874889 C7.61719658,1.07811317 8.89844811,-1.31130219e-05 10.2656372,-1.31130219e-05 C12.6015775,-1.31130219e-05 14.0000167,1.36717602 14.0000167,3.65624125 C14.0000167,5.53124348 12.2812646,7.10155785 12.2109521,7.17187044 L7.34375875,11.859376 C7.25000864,11.9531261 7.12500849,12.0000012 7.00000834,12.0000012 Z">
           </path>
          </g>
         </svg>
        </span>
        Donate
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </nav>
   </section>
   <section class="text-center text-white flex flex-col items-center mb-6 md:mb-0 pr-4 pl-4">
    <h1 class="font-4xl md:font-hero font-thin md:mt-10 mb-8">
     Make Email Easier.
    </h1>
    <p class="font-lg md:font-xl tracking-wide leading-relaxed max-w-xl mb-8 md:mb-16">
     Thunderbird is a free email application that’s easy to set up and customize - and it’s loaded with great features!
    </p>
    <div class="tracking-wider">
     <div class="download-button" id="download-button-desktop-release">
      <div class="nojs-download">
       <div class="download download-dumb">

        </h4>

  <main>
   <section class="mt-20 mb-20 flex flex-col lg:flex-row max-w-6xl mx-auto justify-between pl-8 pr-8">
    <aside class="flex flex-col flex-1 mb-20 lg:mb-0 lg:max-w-sm">
     <h3 class="header-section">
      <span>
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 25 25" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M17.5122185,9.1439567 L21.7633396,4.89283556 L20.2108824,3.34037835 L15.9597613,7.59149949 L17.5122185,9.1439567 Z M23.9977173,4.89283556 C23.9977173,5.13948764 23.9106636,5.37163077 23.7365563,5.54573812 L5.07805187,24.2042425 C4.90394452,24.3783499 4.67180139,24.4654035 4.42514931,24.4654035 C4.17849723,24.4654035 3.94635409,24.3783499 3.77224674,24.2042425 L0.899475463,21.3314712 C0.725368112,21.1573639 0.638314437,20.9252207 0.638314437,20.6785687 C0.638314437,20.4319166 0.725368112,20.1997734 0.899475463,20.0256661 L19.5579798,1.36716171 C19.7320872,1.19305436 19.9642303,1.10600069 20.2108824,1.10600069 C20.4575345,1.10600069 20.6896776,1.19305436 20.863785,1.36716171 L23.7365563,4.23993299 C23.9106636,4.41404034 23.9977173,4.64618348 23.9977173,4.89283556 Z M4.39613142,2.13613584 L5.81800811,2.57140422 L4.39613142,3.00667259 L3.96086304,4.42854929 L3.52559466,3.00667259 L2.10371797,2.57140422 L3.52559466,2.13613584 L3.96086304,0.714259148 L4.39613142,2.13613584 Z M9.47426247,4.48658507 L12.3180159,5.35712183 L9.47426247,6.22765858 L8.60372572,9.07141197 L7.73318897,6.22765858 L4.88943558,5.35712183 L7.73318897,4.48658507 L8.60372572,1.64283168 L9.47426247,4.48658507 Z M22.9675821,11.4218612 L24.3894588,11.8571296 L22.9675821,12.2923979 L22.5323138,13.7142746 L22.0970454,12.2923979 L20.6751687,11.8571296 L22.0970454,11.4218612 L22.5323138,9.9999845 L22.9675821,11.4218612 Z M13.6818568,2.13613584 L15.1037335,2.57140422 L13.6818568,3.00667259 L13.2465884,4.42854929 L12.81132,3.00667259 L11.3894433,2.57140422 L12.81132,2.13613584 L13.2465884,0.714259148 L13.6818568,2.13613584 Z">
         </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </span>
      Tailored for all your needs
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-10 flex-1">
      Thunderbird makes email better for you, bringing together speed, privacy and the latest technologies. Focus on what matters and forget about complexity.
     </p>
     <a class="btn-body self-start" href="/en-US/features">
      Explore all Features
      <span>
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M6.91574413,5.89284986 C6.91574413,5.97767139 6.87333336,6.07309561 6.80971722,6.13671176 L1.86886311,11.0775659 C1.80524696,11.141182 1.70982274,11.1835928 1.62500121,11.1835928 C1.54017968,11.1835928 1.44475546,11.141182 1.38113932,11.0775659 L0.851004755,10.5474313 C0.787388608,10.4838152 0.744977843,10.3989936 0.744977843,10.3035694 C0.744977843,10.2187479 0.787388608,10.1233237 0.851004755,10.0597075 L5.0178624,5.89284986 L0.851004755,1.72599222 C0.787388608,1.66237607 0.744977843,1.56695185 0.744977843,1.48213032 C0.744977843,1.39730879 0.787388608,1.30188457 0.851004755,1.23826842 L1.38113932,0.70813386 C1.44475546,0.644517713 1.54017968,0.602106948 1.62500121,0.602106948 C1.70982274,0.602106948 1.80524696,0.644517713 1.86886311,0.70813386 L6.80971722,5.64898796 C6.87333336,5.71260411 6.91574413,5.80802833 6.91574413,5.89284986 Z">
         </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </span>
     </a>
    </aside>
    <aside class="flex flex-col flex-1 mb-20 lg:mb-0 lg:max-w-sm lg:ml-16 lg:mr-16">
     <h3 class="header-section">
      <span>
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 17 21" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M4.77880832,9.85712957 L12.2073886,9.85712957 L12.2073886,7.07141197 C12.2073886,5.0256506 10.5388598,3.35712183 8.49309846,3.35712183 C6.44733709,3.35712183 4.77880832,5.0256506 4.77880832,7.07141197 L4.77880832,9.85712957 Z M16.8502513,11.2499884 L16.8502513,19.6071412 C16.8502513,20.3761153 16.2263666,21 15.4573925,21 L1.52880445,21 C0.759830315,21 0.135945643,20.3761153 0.135945643,19.6071412 L0.135945643,11.2499884 C0.135945643,10.4810142 0.759830315,9.85712957 1.52880445,9.85712957 L1.99309071,9.85712957 L1.99309071,7.07141197 C1.99309071,3.50221128 4.92389778,0.571404219 8.49309846,0.571404219 C12.0622991,0.571404219 14.9931062,3.50221128 14.9931062,7.07141197 L14.9931062,9.85712957 L15.4573925,9.85712957 C16.2263666,9.85712957 16.8502513,10.4810142 16.8502513,11.2499884 Z">
         </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </span>
      Secure &amp; Private
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-10 flex-1">
      Multiple features, such as built-in Do Not Track and remote content blocking, work together to ensure your safety and privacy, so you can have peace of mind.
     </p>
     <a class="btn-body self-start" href="/en-US/features#secureprotect">
      Know your rights
      <span>
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M6.91574413,5.89284986 C6.91574413,5.97767139 6.87333336,6.07309561 6.80971722,6.13671176 L1.86886311,11.0775659 C1.80524696,11.141182 1.70982274,11.1835928 1.62500121,11.1835928 C1.54017968,11.1835928 1.44475546,11.141182 1.38113932,11.0775659 L0.851004755,10.5474313 C0.787388608,10.4838152 0.744977843,10.3989936 0.744977843,10.3035694 C0.744977843,10.2187479 0.787388608,10.1233237 0.851004755,10.0597075 L5.0178624,5.89284986 L0.851004755,1.72599222 C0.787388608,1.66237607 0.744977843,1.56695185 0.744977843,1.48213032 C0.744977843,1.39730879 0.787388608,1.30188457 0.851004755,1.23826842 L1.38113932,0.70813386 C1.44475546,0.644517713 1.54017968,0.602106948 1.62500121,0.602106948 C1.70982274,0.602106948 1.80524696,0.644517713 1.86886311,0.70813386 L6.80971722,5.64898796 C6.87333336,5.71260411 6.91574413,5.80802833 6.91574413,5.89284986 Z">
         </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </span>
     </a>
    </aside>
    <aside class="flex flex-col flex-1 lg:max-w-sm">
     <h3 class="header-section">
      <span>

      </span>
      Highly Customizable
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-10 flex-1">
      With Add-ons (Extensions &amp; Themes) and many more features you can change the look and feel of Thunderbird in an instant.
     </p>
     <a class="btn-body self-start" href="/en-US/features#customize-email">
      Make it personal
      <span>
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">

      Stay in the loop
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-16 mt-0 max-w-xl text-center pr-4 pl-4">
      Keep yourself up to date with recent announcements and releases by following the official Thunderbird Blog!
     </p>
     <section class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row max-w-6xl mx-auto justify-between pl-8 pr-8 mb-12 leading-relaxed">
      <article class="flex flex-col p-4 flex-1 lg:max-w-sm bg-white rounded shadow-lg mb-10 lg:mb-0">

       </a>
       <p class="blog-body">
        Updating to Thunderbird 78 from 68 Soon the Thunderbird automatic update system will start to deliver the new Thunderbird 78 to current users of the previous release, Thunderbird 68. This blog post is intended to share with you details about …

         Continue reading
        </a>
       </p>

         September 9, 2020
        </span>

         COMMENTS 0
        </span>
       </footer>
      </article>

       <a class="blog-link" href="https://blog.thunderbird.net/2020/07/whats-new-in-thunderbird-78/" title="Continue Reading What’s New in Thunderbird 78">
        What’s New in Thunderbird 78
       </a>
       <p class="blog-body">
        Thunderbird 78 is our newest ESR (extended-support release), which comes out yearly and is considered the latest stable release. Right now you can download the newest version from our website, and existing users will be automatically updated in the near …

         Continue reading
        </a>
       </p>

        Thunderbird’s New Home
       </a>
       <p class="blog-body">
        As of today, the Thunderbird project will be operating from a new wholly owned subsidiary of the Mozilla Foundation, MZLA Technologies Corporation. This move has been in the works for a while as Thunderbird has grown in donations, staff, and …

      </a>
      Thunderbird is funded by users like you
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
      Thunderbird is both free and freedom respecting, but we’re also completely funded by donations! Help us sustain the project and continue to improve.
     </p>
     <a class="btn-donate self-start ml-0 mr-0 font-lg lg:font-base" href="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=home_page_body">
      <span class="inline-block w-3 mr-1">
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 14 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M7.00000834,12.0000012 C6.8750082,12.0000012 6.75000805,11.9531261 6.65625793,11.859376 L1.78125212,7.15624542 C1.71875205,7.10155785 0,5.53124348 0,3.65624125 C0,1.36717602 1.39843917,-1.31130219e-05 3.73437945,-1.31130219e-05 C5.10156858,-1.31130219e-05 6.38282011,1.07811317 7.00000834,1.6874889 C7.61719658,1.07811317 8.89844811,-1.31130219e-05 10.2656372,-1.31130219e-05 C12.6015775,-1.31130219e-05 14.0000167,1.36717602 14.0000167,3.65624125 C14.0000167,5.53124348 12.2812646,7.10155785 12.2109521,7.17187044 L7.34375875,11.859376 C7.25000864,11.9531261 7.12500849,12.0000012 7.00000834,12.0000012 Z">
         </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </span>
      Donate
     </a>
    </aside>
    <aside class="flex flex-col flex-1 lg:max-w-lg">
     <h3 class="header-section">
      <a aria-hidden="true" class="anchor" href="#mailing-list" id="mailing-list">
       <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 17 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
        <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
         <path d="M15.0803746,12.7857105 C15.0803746,12.5245494 14.979928,12.2834777 14.7991242,12.1026739 L12.709836,10.0133857 C12.5290323,9.83258193 12.2779159,9.73213539 12.0267995,9.73213539          </path>
        </g>
       </svg>
      </a>
      Join our Newsletter
     </h3>
     <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
      Keep up with the latest and greatest updates on news, features, events, and previews, and get a sneak peek on the upcoming releases.
     </p>

   </section>
   <section class="pt-20 pb-10 flex bg-calendar lg:pr-20">
    <section class="flex justify-between mx-auto">
     <aside class="hidden lg:flex flex-1 -ml-20">
      <img alt="Lightning Calendar screenshot" class="platform-img w-full h-auto js" data-high-res="true" data-processed="false" data-src-linux="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-linux.png" data-src-linux-high-res="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-linux-high-res.png" data-src-mac="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-mac.png" data-src-mac-high-res="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-mac-high-res.png" data-src-windows="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-windows.png" data-src-windows-high-res="/media/img/l10n/en-US/thunderbird/calendar/screenshot-windows-high-res.png" src=""/>

     <aside class="flex flex-col flex-1 lg:max-w-md mr-8 ml-8 lg:ml-16 lg:mr-16 lg:pt-12">
      <h3 class="header-section">
       <span>
        <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 25 27" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
         <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
          <path d="M2.1773832,24.8571451 L22.605979,24.8571451 L22.605979,9.9999845 L2.1773832,9.9999845 L2.1773832,24.8571451 Z M7.74881841,7.2142669 L7.74881841,3.03569049 C7.74881841,2.77452946 7.54569317,2.57140422 7.28453214,2.57140422 L6.35595961,2.57140422 C6.09479858,2.57140422 5.89167334,2.77452946 5.89167334,3.03569049 L5.89167334,7.2142669 C5.89167334,7.47542792 6.09479858,7.67855316 6.35595961,7.67855316 L7.28453214,7.67855316 C7.54569317,7.67855316 7.74881841,7.47542792 7.74881841,7.2142669 Z M18.8916888,7.2142669 L18.8916888,3.03569049 C18.8916888,2.77452946 18.6885636,2.57140422 18.4274026,2.57140422 L17.49883,2.57140422 C17.237669,2.57140422 17.0345438,2.77452946 17.0345438,3.03569049 L17.0345438,7.2142669 C17.0345438,7.47542792 17.237669,7.67855316 17.49883,7.67855316 L18.4274026,7.67855316 C18.6885636,7.67855316 18.8916888,7.47542792 18.8916888,7.2142669 Z M24.4631241,6.28569436 L24.4631241,24.8571451 C24.4631241,25.8727713 23.6216052,26.7142901 22.605979,26.7142901 L2.1773832,26.7142901 C1.16175699,26.7142901 0.320238129,25.8727713 0.320238129,24.8571451 L0.320238129,6.28569436 C0.320238129,5.27006815 1.16175699,4.42854929 2.1773832,4.42854929 L4.03452827,4.42854929 L4.03452827,3.03569049 C4.03452827,1.75890325 5.07917237,0.714259148 6.35595961,0.714259148 L7.28453214,0.714259148 C8.56131938,0.714259148 9.60596348,1.75890325 9.60596348,3.03569049 L9.60596348,4.42854929 L15.1773987,4.42854929 L15.1773987,3.03569049 C15.1773987,1.75890325 16.2220428,0.714259148 17.49883,0.714259148 L18.4274026,0.714259148 C19.7041898,0.714259148 20.7488339,1.75890325 20.7488339,3.03569049 L20.7488339,4.42854929 L22.605979,4.42854929 C23.6216052,4.42854929 24.4631241,5.27006815 24.4631241,6.28569436 Z">
          </path>
         </g>
        </svg>
       </span>
       <aside class="flex flex-col">
        Lightning Calendar
        <small class="font-normal font-md tracking-normal normal-case">
         Organize your life — it’s about time!
        </small>
       </aside>
      </h3>
      <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-6">
       Organize your schedule and life’s important events in a calendar that’s fully integrated with your Thunderbird email.
      </p>
      <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-10">
       Manage multiple calendars, create your daily to do list, invite friends to events, and subscribe to public calendars.
      </p>
      <p class="flex justify-start">
       <a class="btn-body" href="/en-US/calendar">
        Explore Features
        <span>
         <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
          <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" id="UI" stroke="none" stroke-width="1">
           <path d="M6.91574413,5.89284986 C6.91574413,5.97767139 6.87333336,6.07309561 6.80971722,6.13671176 L1.86886311,11.0775659 C1.80524696,11.141182 1.70982274,11.1835928 1.62500121,11.1835928 C1.54017968,11.1835928 1.44475546,11.141182 1.38113932,11.0775659 L0.851004755,10.5474313 C0.787388608,10.4838152 0.744977843,10.3989936 0.744977843,10.3035694 C0.744977843,10.2187479 0.787388608,10.1233237 0.851004755,10.0597075 L5.0178624,5.89284986 L0.851004755,1.72599222 C0.787388608,1.66237607 0.744977843,1.56695185 0.744977843,1.48213032 C0.744977843,1.39730879 0.787388608,1.30188457 0.851004755,1.23826842 L1.38113932,0.70813386 C1.44475546,0.644517713 1.54017968,0.602106948 1.62500121,0.602106948 C1.70982274,0.602106948 1.80524696,0.644517713 1.86886311,0.70813386 L6.80971722,5.64898796 C6.87333336,5.71260411 6.91574413,5.80802833 6.91574413,5.89284986 Z">
           </path>
          </g>
         </svg>
        </span>
       </a>
       <a class="btn-body btn-secondary ml-4" href="https://addons.thunderbird.net">
        Explore More Add-ons
        <span>
         <svg version="1.1" viewbox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">

    </section>

   <section class="pt-10 pb-10 lg:pt-20 lg:pb-20 flex bg-prefooter bg-grey-lighter">
    <section class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row flex-1 max-w-6xl mx-auto justify-between pl-8 pr-8">
     <article class="flex flex-1 lg:max-w-md mb-20 lg:mb-0">
      <aside class="w-16 md:w-24 pt-4">
       <img alt="Get Involved" class="w-full h-auto" src="/media/img/thunderbird/handshake.png" srcset="/media/img/thunderbird/handshake-high-res.png 1.5x"/>
      </aside>
      <main class="flex flex-col flex-1 ml-4">
       <h3 class="header-section">
        Get Involved
       </h3>
       <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
        Thunderbird is an open source project, which means anyone can contribute ideas, designs, code, and time helping fellow users.
       </p>
       <a class="btn-join self-start ml-3 mr-3" href="/en-US/get-involved">
        Join Us
       </a>
       <p class="font-sm mt-0 text-blue font-semibold self-start">
        <a class="small-link text-blue" href="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=pre_footer">
         Make a Donation
        </a>
        •
        <a class="small-link text-blue" href="https://support.mozilla.org/products/thunderbird/">
         Get Support
        </a>
        •
        <a class="small-link text-blue" href="https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/describecomponents.cgi?product=Thunderbird">
         Report a Bug
        </a>
       </p>
      </main>
     </article>

      <section class="tab release flex flex-1">
       <aside class="w-16 md:w-24 pt-4">
        <img alt="Thunderbird" class="w-full h-auto" src="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/release.png" srcset="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/release-high-res.png 1.5x"/>
       </aside>
       <main class="flex flex-col flex-1 ml-4">
        <h3 class="header-section">
         Thunderbird
        </h3>
        <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
         Thunderbird is a free email application that’s easy to set up and customize - and it’s loaded with great features!
        </p>
        <aside class="ml-0 mr-0 self-start text-center text-green font-semibold">
         <div class="download-button" id="download-button-desktop-release">
          <div class="nojs-download">
           <div class="download download-dumb">
            <h4>
             Download Thunderbird — English (US)
            </h4>
            <ul class="list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg justify-center">
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-msi-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows MSI 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">
               macOS
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Linux 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux&amp;lang=en-US">
               Linux 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="unrecognized-download os_android os_ios">
           <div class="download download-dumb">
            <h4>
             Download Thunderbird — English (US)
            </h4>
            <ul class="list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg justify-center">
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-msi-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows MSI 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">
               macOS
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux64&amp;lang=en-US">
               Linux 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win&amp;lang=en-US">
               Windows 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux&amp;lang=en-US">
               Linux 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <p class="unsupported-download p-links">
           Your system doesn't meet the
           <a href="/en-US/thunderbird/78.8.1/system-requirements/">
            requirements
           </a>
           to run Thunderbird.
          </p>
          <p class="linux-arm-download mb-8 p-links">
           Please follow
           <a href="https://support.mozilla.org/kb/installing-thunderbird-linux">
            these instructions
           </a>
           to install Thunderbird.
          </p>
          <ul class="download-list list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg mb-0 justify-center">
           <li class="os_win64 ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_msi ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-msi-SSL&amp;os=win64&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_osx ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=osx&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_linux64 ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux64&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_win ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=win&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_linux ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-download" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://download.mozilla.org/?product=thunderbird-78.8.1-SSL&amp;os=linux&amp;lang=en-US">
             Download Thunderbird
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p class="download-other download-other-desktop os_android os_ios os_linux os_linux64 os_osx os_win os_win64 os_winsha1 font-sm mt-0">

            Systems &amp; Languages
           </a>
           •
           <a class="small-link" href="/en-US/thunderbird/78.8.1/releasenotes/">
            What’s New
           </a>
           •
           <a class="small-link" href="https://www.mozilla.org/privacy/thunderbird/">
            Privacy
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </aside>
       </main>
      </section>
      <section class="tab beta flex flex-1">
       <aside class="w-16 md:w-24 pt-4">
        <img alt="Thunderbird Beta" class="w-full h-auto" src="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/beta.png" srcset="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/beta-high-res.png 1.5x"/>
       </aside>
       <main class="flex flex-col flex-1 ml-4">
        <h3 class="header-section">
         The Future of Thunderbird
        </h3>
        <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
         Experience cutting edge features. Provide feedback to help refine and polish what will be in the final release.
        </p>

      <section class="tab nightly flex flex-1">
       <aside class="w-16 md:w-24 pt-4">
        <img alt="Thunderbird Nightly" class="w-full h-auto" src="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/nightly.png" srcset="/media/img/thunderbird/logos/nightly-high-res.png 1.5x"/>
       </aside>
       <main class="flex flex-col flex-1 ml-4">
        <h3 class="header-section">
         Thunderbird Nightly
        </h3>
        <p class="font-lg tracking-wider leading-loose mb-8 mt-0 flex-1">
         Help us test the newest developments made to Thunderbird every day by using the unstable Nightly channel.
        </p>
        <p class="tracking-wider leading-loose mb-2 mt-0 flex-1 text-black-light">
         <span class="bg-orange p-1 rounded-sm font-bold mr-1 inline-block leading-none text-white font-sm">
          WARNING!
         </span>
         Nightly is an unstable testing and development platform, make sure you back up important data regularly!
        </p>
        <aside class="ml-0 mr-0 self-start text-center text-blue font-semibold">
         <div class="download-button download-button-nightly" id="download-button-desktop-nightly">
          <div class="nojs-download">
           <div class="download download-dumb">
            <h4>
             Download Thunderbird — English (US)
            </h4>
            <ul class="list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg self-start">
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win64.installer.exe">
               Windows 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win64.installer.exe">
               Windows MSI 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.mac.dmg">
               macOS
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.linux-x86_64.tar.bz2">
               Linux 64-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win32.installer.exe">
               Windows 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.linux-i686.tar.bz2">
               Linux 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="unrecognized-download os_android os_ios">
           <div class="download download-dumb">
            <h4>
             Download Thunderbird — English (US)
            </h4>
            <ul class="list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg self-start">
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win64.installer.exe">

              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">

              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.linux-x86_64.tar.bz2">

              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win32.installer.exe">

              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="ml-3 mr-3">
              <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.linux-i686.tar.bz2">
               Linux 32-bit
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <p class="unsupported-download p-links">
           Your system doesn't meet the
           <a href="/en-US/thunderbird/88.0a1/system-requirements/">
            requirements
           </a>
           to run Thunderbird.
          </p>
          <p class="linux-arm-download mb-8 p-links">
           Please follow
           <a href="https://support.mozilla.org/kb/installing-thunderbird-linux">
            these instructions
           </a>
           to install Thunderbird.
          </p>
          <ul class="download-list list-none p-0 flex flex-wrap max-w-lg mb-0 self-start">
           <li class="os_win64 ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win64.installer.exe">
             Download Nightly
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_msi ml-3 mr-3">
            <a class="download-link btn-nightly" data-donate-link="https://donate.mozilla.org/thunderbird/?utm_source=thunderbird.net&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_content=post_download&amp;tbdownload=true" href="https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/nightly/latest-comm-central-l10n/thunderbird-88.0a1.en-US.win64.installer.exe">
             Download Nightly
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_osx ml-3 mr-3">

             Download Nightly
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_linux64 ml-3 mr-3">

             Download Nightly
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="os_win ml-3 mr-3">

          <p class="download-other download-other-desktop os_android os_ios os_linux os_linux64 os_osx os_win os_win64 os_winsha1 font-sm mt-0">

            Privacy
           </a>
          </p>
         </div>
        </aside>
       </main>
      </section>
     </article>
    </section>
   </section>

           <path d="M112.447189,31.9913283 C103.726855,18.7161731 96.8176134,15.3432064 96.8176134,15.3432064 C96.8176134,15.3432064 97.1349417,25.0132033 101.976906,29.6771542 C102.530295,30.2096464 96.182957,25.5278942 96.182957,25.5278942 C96.182957,25.5278942 94.8254114,29.9944824 97.9360019,35.1290078 C97.0327774,33.9285783 96.4344977,33.4742572 96.4344977,33.4742572 C96.4344977,33.4742572 90.5747612,36.1761909 88.8449354,39.9253077 C87.9517726,38.2395983 87.2815135,37.2458192 87.2815135,37.2458192 C87.2815135,37.2458192 83.228226,45.3345929 83.738273,54.7128027 C84.5671963,69.9615845 80.8823191,75.5798419 80.8823191,75.5798419 C80.8823191,75.5798419 90.7527746,71.7928005 95.4856089,59.6019791 C97.4406603,64.7852647 95.4260131,70.2409882 95.4260131,70.2409882 C95.4260131,70.2409882 103.401013,64.2821834 105.116133,53.4210446 C107.017007,56.4867448 106.4582,62.6057616 106.4582,62.6057616 C106.4582,62.6057616 111.548609,55.5185068 111.672444,47.8004653 C114.031508,49.4451542 114.248994,55.8706637 114.248994,55.8706637 C114.248994,55.8706637 121.795988,46.2215639 112.447189,31.9913283 Z" fill="url(#linearGradient-12)" id="path1381">
           </path>

         </g>
         <path d="M509,60 C506.790861,60 505,58.209139 505,56 C505,53.790861 506.790861,52 509,52 C511.209139,52 513,53.790861 513,56 C513,58.209139 511.209139,60 509,60 Z M509.025199,59.234653 C510.792511,59.234653 512.225199,57.8019642 512.225199,56.034653 C512.225199,54.2673419 510.792511,52.834653 509.025199,52.834653 C507.257888,52.834653 505.825199,54.2673419 505.825199,56.034653 C505.825199,57.8019642 507.257888,59.234653 509.025199,59.234653 Z" fill="#FFFFFF" id="Combined-Shape">

      </svg>
     </a>

     </li>

     </li>

       Participation Guidelines
      </a>
     </li>
     <li class="ml-2 mr-2 mt-2">

       Report Trademark or Copyright Infringement
      </a>
